Now responsive is nothing more than players being brought into the game.
So what do we mean by that?
As these prices move higher up, what then happens is as price is advertised higher at
this point, we see a responsive seller step into the market and sell it to the initiative
buyer.
However, once that responsive buyer stops responding to higher prices, the initiative
buyer will then continue to buy the market up until he finds again responsive sellers.
so forth and so forth, initiative buying until we run into responsive sellers.
Now the degree of responsive selling is going to dictate how we move up.
Little responsive selling and it will look aggressive.
A lot of responsive selling and it will look a lot less aggressive and more grindy.

B profiles, both long liquidation and short profit taking.
So those are the key sort of symmetrical versus non-symmetrical type pattern plays.
